ctl:suite.name: sos:suite
ctl:suite.ctl:title: SOS 2.0 Compliance Test Suite
ctl:suite.ctl:description: Verifies that an SOS 2.0 implementation complies with a given conformance class.

ctl:test.name: sos:Main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The IUT satisfies all applicable assertions.

body.h2: Compliance test suite for Sensor Observation Service (SOS) 2.0
body.p: Please provide a URL from which a capabilities document can be retrieved.
Modify the URL template below to specify the location of an OGC SOS implementation under test.
Please select how tho send this request.
Please select whether to run all tests or just selected tests.
If you want to run selected tests, please select the checkboxes for the tests you want to run.
Please press the "Start" button to start testing.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

ctl:message.select: concat('Run GetCapabilities test via GET:',$IsGetCapabilities-GET,', URL:',$GetCapabilities-URL)
concat('Run DescribeSensor test via GET: ',$IsDescribeSensor-GET,', URL:',$DescribeSensor-URL)
concat('Run GetObservation test via GET: ',$IsGetObservation-GET,', URL:',$GetObservation-URL)
concat('Run GetFeatureOfInterest test via GET: ',$IsGetFeatureOfInterest-GET,', URL:',$GetFeatureOfInterest-URL)
concat('Run GetFeatureOfInterest test via GET: ',$IsGetObservationById-GET,', URL:',$GetObservationById-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If InsertSensor Operation is supported by service, the InsertSensor operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run InsertSensor test via GET: false, URL:',$InsertSensor-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If DeleteSensor Operation is supported by service, the DeleteSensor operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run DeleteSensor test via GET: false, URL:',$DeleteSensor-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If InsertObservation Operation is supported by service, the InsertObservation operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run InsertObservation test via GET: false, URL:',$InsertObservation-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If InsertResultTemplate Operation is supported by service, the InsertResultTemplate operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run InsertResultTemplate test via GET: false, URL:',$InsertResultTemplate-URL)

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: If InsertResult Operation is supported by service, the InsertResult operation must support Http-post .

ctl:message.select: concat('Run InsertResult test via GET: false, URL:',$InsertResult-URL)
concat('Run GetResultTemplate test via GET: ',$IsGetResultTemplate-GET,', URL:',$GetResultTemplate-URL)
concat('Run GetResult test via GET: ',$IsGetResult-GET,', URL:',$GetResult-URL)

ctl:test.name: sos:general-main
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "general" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the general module.

ctl:test.name: sos:general-SOS.General-InvalidRequest.1
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Sending a request that is non-conformant to a schema associated with an SOS operation causes the server to return a valid error report message with an exceptionCode value of InvalidRequest.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the service returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode value of InvalidRequest; fail otherwise.

ctl:message.select: 'This test does not support KVP type request,so passed.'
'This server cannot send soap request which body is only "test",so passed.'
'The body of the request will be "test"'

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response to an invalid request or the response from the server was not a valid exception report. The response from the server was: ""

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: The response was
Checking the validity of the response to an invalid request.
The validity check returned:

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: The response to an invalid request was expected to be an exception report with an exceptionCode of "InvalidRequest" and a locator value containing the validation issue. The returned exception report was: ""

ctl:test.name: sos:GetCapabilities-Test
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: All assertions for "GetCapabilities" conformance are satisfied.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Test driver for the GetCapabilities module.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCCorrectServiceParameter
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetCapabilities request that includes a service parameter with CORRECT VALUE provided shall include an complete capabilities document.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.
FAILURE: The root element from the response to a GetCapabilities request "" does not match the expected root element of ""

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Passed.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCOperationMetadataMandatory
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are three operations ,GetCapabilities DescribeSensor and GetObservation, in OperationMetadata in the Capabilities.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if there are at least three operations in OperationMetadata Sections in the Capabilities.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Mandatory Operation "GetCapabilities" Missed in OperationMetadata.
FAILURE: Mandatory Operation "DescribeSensor" Missed in OperationMetadata.
FAILURE: Mandatory Operation "GetObservation" Missed in OperationMetadata.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Passed.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCRequiredSectionsInCapabilities
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: There are required sections,ServiceIdentification ServiceProvider OperationMetadata filter_Capabilities and contents in the Capabilities.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if there are at least required sections in the Capabilities.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Required section "ServiceIdentification" Missed in the Capabilities.
FAILURE: Required section "ServiceProvider" Missed in the Capabilities.
FAILURE: Required section "OperationMetadata" Missed in the Capabilities.
FAILURE: Required section "filterCapabilities" Missed in the Capabilities.
FAILURE: Required section "contents" Missed in the Capabilities.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Passed.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCWrongSectionParameter
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The response to a GetCapabilities request that includes a sections parameter with WRONG VALUE provided shall be an exception with exceptionCode=InvalidParameterValue and location=section.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the response is an exception response and schema valid and exceptionCode=InvalidParameterValue and location=section.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Checking the validity of the response to a GetCapabilities request with section= 'WrongSections'.
FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a GetCapabilities request with section= 'WrongSections'.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "InvalidParameterValue" and a locator of "section".

ctl:test.name: sos:GCBBOX
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The spatial operator BBOX is listed in the FilterCapabilities of the Capabilities document
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the BBOX operator is listed in the FilterCapabilities section.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The BBOX operator is not listed in the FilterCapabilities section.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Passed.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCOperatorDuringAndTEquals
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The During and TEquals TemporalOperators are listed in the FilterCapabilities of the Capabilities document.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the During and TEquals TemporalOperators are listed in the FilterCapabilities section.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The During TemporalOperator is not listed in the FilterCapabilities section.
FAILURE: The TEquals TemporalOperator is not listed in the FilterCapabilities section.

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Passed.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCParametersInObservationOffering
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Every elements in each observationOffering occur specified times.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if all elements in each observationOffering or in Contents occur specified times.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Each ObservationOffering must contains one and only one identifier.
FAILURE: The Contents or Each ObservationOffering must contains one or more observableProperty.
FAILURE: Each ObservationOffering must contains one and only one procedure.
FAILURE: The Contents or Each ObservationOffering must contains one or more procedureDescriptionFormat.
FAILURE: The Contents or Each ObservationOffering must contains one or more observationType.
FAILURE: Each ObservationOffering must contains zero or one observedArea.
FAILURE: Each ObservationOffering must contains zero or one phenomenonTime.
FAILURE: The Contents or Each ObservationOffering must contains one or more responseFormat.
FAILURE: Each ObservationOffering must contains zero or one resultTime.

ctl:test.name: sos:GCResponseFormat
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: The responseFormat element which value is "http://www.opengis.net/om/2.0" is listed in the ObservationOffering or in the Contents of the Capabilities document.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the responseFormat element which value is "http://www.opengis.net/om/2.0" is listed in the ObservationOffering or Contents element.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: The ObservationOffering (identifier = ) must contain responseFormat which value is "http://www.opengis.net/om/2.0".

ctl:test.name: sos:GCInsertionCapabilities
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Check that the InsertionCapabilities is contained in a Capabilities response, if it is requested. If existed ,check that the InsertionCapabilities is structured as defined in Subclause 10.1.1 of SOS 2.0 specification.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the InsertionCapabilities is contained in the Capabilities response and they are valid.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Elements "sos:procedureDescriptionFormat" must be contained in sos:InsertionCapabilities (one or many).
Elements "sos:featureOfInterestType" must be contained in sos:InsertionCapabilities (one or many).
Elements "sos:observationType" must be contained in sos:InsertionCapabilities (one or many).

xsl:if.test: not(($target eq string('procedureDescriptionFormat')) or ($target eq string('featureOfInterestType')) or ($target eq string('observationType')) or ($target eq string('supportedEncoding')))
xsl:if.ctl:message: Elements "" in InsertionCapabilities must be one of "procedureDescriptionFormat,featureOfInterestType,observationType,supportedEncoding".

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: Elements "InsertionCapabilities" must be contained in sos:extension in the capabilities.
Section "InsertionCapabilities" is no contained in OperationsMetadata/Sections. So skip this test.

ctl:test.name: sos:DescribeSensor-Test
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Execute DescribeSensor Test.
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if all the subtest not fail; fail otherwise.

ctl:test.name: sos:DSRequestNoService
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Send a request (KVP) without parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "MissingParameterValue" and locator "service". Send a request (POST or SOAP) without parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "InvalidRequest" and locator "Expected attribute: service in element DescribeSensor@http://www.opengis.net/swes/2.0".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the server (KVP) returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "MissingParameterValue" and locator is "service"; fail otherwise. Pass if the server (POST or SOAP) returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "InvalidRequest" and locator is "Expected attribute: service in element DescribeSensor@http://www.opengis.net/swes/2.0"; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the DescribeSensor response schema for "SOS" />.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Checking the validity of the response to a DescribeSensor request with no service parameter.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a DescribeSensor request with no service parameter specified.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "MissingParameterValue" and a locator of "service".

xsl:otherwise.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a DescribeSensor request with no service parameter specified.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "InvalidRequest" and a locator of "Expected attribute: service in element DescribeSensor@http://www.opengis.net/swes/2.0".

ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Send a request with null parameter "service",and the response must be a valid exception with code "MissingParameterValue" and locator "service".
ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if the server returns a valid exception message with an exceptionCode "MissingParameterValue" and locator is "service"; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the DescribeSensor response schema for "SOS" />.

xsl:if.ctl:message: Checking the validity of the response to a DescribeSensor request with invalid service parameter.
FAILURE: The server did not return the expected exception report response to a DescribeSensor request with null service parameter specified.
The response was expected to be an ExceptionReport with an exceptionCode of "MissingParameterValue" and a locator of "service".

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the DescribeSensor response schema for "SOS" />.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: The server did not return a response, or the response was not valid according to the DescribeSensor response schema for "SOS" />.
The root element from the response to a DescribeSensor request "" does not match the expected root element of ""
The procedureDescriptionFormat from the response to a DescribeSensor request :"does not match the procedureDescriptionFormat :"" in the DescribeSensor request.

ctl:test.ctl:comment: Pass if all the subtest not fail; fail otherwise.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.
